What do you think of Pixel Minimal Watch Face?
I develop it on my free time, doing the best I can to make it look great and as optimised as possible.\n\nThere still might be things to improve so I would really appreciate your feedback.
I\'m sad to hear that. Would you mind sending me your feedback?
I\'m glad you enjoy it. Feel like helping with a good rating on the PlayStore?
